title: Messageboard Back-End
description: Node.JS and PSQL back-end for a basic messageboard using Knex.JS as an SQL query builder and Express.JS server.

title: Messageboard Front-End
description: React based front-end linked with the above messageboard back-end. Axios is used as an HTTP server.

title: Ursa
description: Ethereum based dApp to illustrate the benefits and considerable drawbacks of online voting. Ensure you are connected to the Ethereum Ropsten test network through a tool such as MetaMask to access.

title: SF VOX
description: I'm a voice actor in my spare time, so I built myself a website to use as a portfolio of work to send to clients. I wanted to keep it extremely simple and easy to navigate, so it's made with a minimal React components and styled with Bootstrap by way of Reactstrap.
